mapper.sql: select staffNo, managerId, password, type, storeNo, name, telephone, date_format(date, '%y-%m-%d') as date from storeMember
mapper.insert: insert into StoreMember(managerId, type, password, storeNo, name, telephone, date) values (#{managerId}, #{type}, #{password}, #{storeNo}, #{name}, #{telephone}, curDate())
mapper.select:
select StoreMember.staffNo, StoreMember.managerId, StoreMember.name, StoreMember.telephone, date_format(date, '%y-%m-%d') as date, StoreMember.storeNo, store.storeName from StoreMember left join store on StoreMember.storeNo = store.storeNo where
name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
managerId like concat('%',#{managerId},'%')
storeName like concat('%',#{storeName},'%')
